item.description: This will be a round-robin session where different presenters will provide feedback on their progress this year: Amanda Miller, Rajesh Jaiswal, Peter Melencio, Angela Haynes, Larry Chism, Dayanna Moreno, and John Scott Smith. Discussion of any proprietary information by any member is considered confidential and should not be divulged outside this meetup group without the express permission of the member who shared that private information. Thank you for your interest in our group.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Business Meetup Group
item.name: The Framingham Small Business October Meetup
